definition[0]: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
example[0]: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
example[1]: My arms are sore from all the lifting.
definition[1]: upset, angry, and annoyed, especially because you have not been treated fairly
example[2]: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
example[3]: Don’t be sore at me – I just forgot to tell you.
definition[2]: used to emphasize how serious, difficult etc something is
example[4]: Inner city schools are in sore need of extra funds.
definition[3]: a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection
example[5]: They were starving and covered with sores.
